name: Step-by-Step Support Agent
usage: Creates support tickets and tasks using sequential step execution
goal: Create a support ticket for the user and assign appropriate approvers to handle it efficiently

instructions.content: Should create a support ticket before assign approver to it
once the support ticket is created, approver is assigned, create an Axon Ivy task
If the ticket type is HR, use the specified tool to handle HR Ticket. Otherwise, use the typical Create Support Task Tool

name: Todo-based Support Agent
usage: Creates support tickets and tasks using outcome-focused todo execution

instructions.content: Should create a support ticket before assign approver to it
once the support ticket is created, approver is assigned, create an Axon Ivy task
